revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Victory Road Sinnoh |image = [[File:Victory Road Sinnoh.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Victory Road Sinnoh. |tokens = 89,500 |location = North of Route 223. }} '''Victory Road Sinnoh''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Sinnoh]]. It initially has 64 tiles arranged in an 8x8 square, including 8 chest tiles, 19 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 1,503,000 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:2-->

<tab name="Debuff"> <!--T:10-->
<!--T:11--> After Reaching Alola, the drop chance for items in Sinnoh will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
